text: Bedford is a town in Westchester County, New York, USA. The population was 17,309 at the 2020 census. According to the United States Census Bureau, the town has a total area of , of which is land and , or 5.5%, is water. The town is bordered to the west by Mount Kisco and the town of New Castle. ==References== Category:Towns in New York (state)
title: Bedford, New York
